name: THE NORTHWESTERN MUTUAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY
sampleDescriptions: H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), and S. 1, an original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.
Legislative and regulatory services related to tax reform, PL 115-97 Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.
Legislative and regulatory services related to tax reform, PL 115-97 Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, and H.R. 748, Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act.

Legislative and regulatory services related to tax reform, PL 115-97 Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, and H.R. 748, Coronavirus Aid, Relief, Economic Security (CARES) Act, H.R. 8406, the HEROES Act, Amendment to S. 178, Health, Economic Assistance, Liability Protection, and Schools (HEALS) Act.

Legislative and regulatory services related to tax reform, PL 115-97 Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, H.R. 748, Coronavirus Aid, Relief, Economic Security (CARES) Act, H.R. 8406, the HEROES Act, H.R. 133, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021, and Amendment to S. 178, Health, Economic Assistance, Liability Protection, and Schools (HEALS) Act.
Insurance tax issues and H.R. 5376, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 14.
Insurance tax issues and H.R. 2617, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023.
Insurance tax issues and H.R. 1, 2025 Budget Reconciliation Bill.
